original_text: saying, “Go into the village in front of you, where on entering you will find a colt tied, on which no one has ever yet sat. Untie it and bring it here.
korean_text: 이르시되 너희는 맞은편 마을로 가라 그리로 들어가면 아직 아무도 타 보지 않은 나귀 새끼가 매여 있는 것을 보리니 풀어 끌고 오라

sentences.original_text: Go into the village in front of you
where on entering you will find a colt tied
sentences.korean_translation: 들어가면 매여 있는 나귀 새끼를 발견할 것이요

sentences.original_text: on which no one has ever yet sat
